CmdLine: echo 'debconf debconf/frontend select Noninteractive' | debconf-set-selections     && echo "deb http://ftp.debian.org/debian jessie-backports main" >> /etc/apt/sources.list.d/backports.list     && echo "deb http://apt.llvm.org/jessie/ llvm-toolchain-jessie-${CLANG_VERSION} main" >> /etc/apt/sources.list.d/llvm.list     && wget -O - http://apt.llvm.org/llvm-snapshot.gpg.key | apt-key add -     && apt-get update     && apt-get -t llvm-toolchain-jessie-$CLANG_VERSION install -y --no-install-recommends clang-$CLANG_VERSION lldb-$CLANG_VERSION     && apt-get -t jessie-backports install -y --no-install-recommends cmake     && apt-get install -y --force-yes --no-install-recommends build-essential         llvm         libunwind-dev         libicu-dev         python     && update-alternatives --install /usr/bin/clang clang /usr/bin/clang-$CLANG_VERSION 100     && update-alternatives --install /usr/bin/clang++ clang++ /usr/bin/clang++-$CLANG_VERSION 100     && wget --quiet -O "node-chakracore.tar.gz" https://api.github.com/repos/nodejs/node-chakracore/tarball/xplat > /dev/null 2>&1     && tar -zxf node-chakracore.tar.gz     && rm -rf node-chakracore.tar.gz     && cd nodejs-node-chakracore-*     && ./configure --prefix=/usr --engine=chakracore --partly-static --download=all     && NPROC=$(grep -c ^processor /proc/cpuinfo 2>/dev/null || 1)     && make -j${NPROC}     && make install     && paxctl -cm /usr/bin/node     && cd ../     && rm -rf nodejs-node-chakracore-*     && apt-get purge --auto-remove -y llvm cmake build-essential clang-$CLANG_VERSION lldb-$CLANG_VERSION python     && apt-get clean -y     && apt-get autoclean -y     && apt-get autoremove -y     && rm -rf /usr/share/man /tmp/* /var/cache/apk/* /root/.npm /root/.node-gyp         /usr/lib/node_modules/npm/man /usr/lib/node_modules/npm/doc /usr/lib/node_modules/npm/html         /var/lib/apt/lists/*
Commands.Name: run
